Author:

Constructor Summary
ClusterManager(Clustered cluster, InetAddress multicastGroup, int multicastPort, int rmiPort)
          Creates a cluster manager that will use multicast discovery to find peers with similar configurations.
ClusterManager(Clustered cluster, InetAddress multicastGroup, int multicastPort, int rmiPort, String netInterface, String serverNames)
          Creates a cluster manager that will use multicast discovery as well as a list of server names to find peers in this cluster.
ClusterManager(Clustered cluster, int rmiPort, String netInterface, String serverNames)
          Allows the cluster to be defined explicitly by providing names rather than by using multicast discovery.
ClusterManager(Restartable restartableObj, String clusterName, String serverName, InetAddress multicastGroup, int multicastPort, int rmiPort, String netInterface, String serverNames)
          Convenience method for users of the Restartable interface within the TeaServletClusterHook.

          Convenience method for users of the Restartable interface within the TeaServletClusterHook.

launchAuto

public void launchAuto()
Launches an AutomaticClusterManagementThread in active mode.

launchAuto

public void launchAuto(boolean active)
Allows the management thread to passively take part in the cluster operations. Other cluster members will not be made aware of this instance.

launchAuto

public void launchAuto(AutomaticClusterManagementThread auto)
permits the AutomaticClusterManagementThread to be subclassed and used into the ClusterManager.
